QuestData.Title: Iridium Recovery
QuestData.Description: My goods used to be for the very best, now the Iron Horde make copies out of poor metal and give them to everyone.$b$bI'm going to show them what a real smith can do in your arsenal, but first I'm going to need a powerful flux to make the metal as pure as it can get.$b$bThe dust from crushed iridium geodes would work in a pinch but we need to find some first. They tend to congregate underground, so check out the mine in Kuuro's Claim nearby.
QuestData.LogDescription: Gather $1oa Iridium Dust from Iridium Geodes in Kuuro's Claim.
QuestData.RewardText: This won't be as good as some of the mixes we had back in the Blackrock foundries, but it will do.
